recipe.title: Baked Chicken Parmesan Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 ball ; fresh mozzarella cheese, thinly sliced
½ cup ; panko bread crumbs ; (25 g)

steps.step: In a medium bowl, combine the panko, parmesan cheese, basil, garlic powder, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Beat the 2 eggs in a shallow dish. Dredge the chicken in the egg wash, then coat with the bread crumb mixture.
Transfer the breaded chicken breasts to a greased roasting pan. Top the chicken with 2 small slices of mozzarella.
Bake for 20-25 min, until the cheese and bread crumbs have turned golden brown and the chicken is cooked through, or until it has reached an internal temperature of 165°F (73°C).
Serve with whole wheat spaghetti, marinara sauce, and a sprinkle of fresh basil.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a medium bowl, combine the panko, parmesan cheese, basil, garlic powder, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Beat the 2 eggs in a shallow dish.
Dredge the chicken in the egg wash, then coat with the bread crumb mixture.
Transfer the breaded chicken breasts to a greased roasting pan.
Top the chicken with 2 small slices of mozzarella.
Bake for 20-25 min, until the cheese and bread crumbs have turned golden brown and the chicken is cooked through, or until it has reached an internal temperature of 165°F (73°C).
Serve with whole wheat spaghetti, marinara sauce, and a sprinkle of fresh basil.
